description:
The navigation apps people use to get around town are going haywire! Where`s everyone going?! And could an Appmon be behind this?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ayashiki Michi Saki Annainin! Sessha Nabimon de Gozaru!
The Suspicious Travel Guide! Navimon I Am!
あやしき道先案内人! 拙者ナビモンでござる!
